title: Simon Yates Crowned Winner, Olav Kooij Wins Sprint to Cap Visma-Lease a Bike Giro d’Italia Dominance
content:
A few favorites crashed or faded, and rising stars like Del Toro and Gee confirmed GC promise in a wild three weeks at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Simon Yates Crowned Winner, Olav Kooij Wins Sprint to Cap Visma-Lease a Bike Giro d’Italia Dominance on Velo.
author: ahood
